mapper.select: SELECT ci.id, ci.user_id AS userId, ci.product_id AS productId, p.name AS productName, p.image AS productImage, p.price AS productPrice, ci.quantity, (p.price * ci.quantity) AS subtotal, ci.create_time AS createTime, ci.update_time AS updateTime FROM cart_items ci LEFT JOIN products p ON ci.product_id = p.id WHERE ci.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY ci.create_time DESC
SELECT id, user_id AS userId, product_id AS productId, quantity, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime FROM cart_items WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND product_id = #{productId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_items (user_id, product_id, quantity, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{quantity}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart_items WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND product_id = #{productId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cart_items WHERE user_id = #{userId}
